playn.core.gl

Class QuadShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.gl.GLShader
      • playn.core.gl.QuadShader

  • public class QuadShader
extends GLShader
    A GLShader implementation that only handles quads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class playn.core.gl.GLShader

        GLShader.Attrib, GLShader.Uniform1f, GLShader.Uniform1i, GLShader.Uniform2f, GLShader.Uniform2fv, GLShader.Uniform2i, GLShader.Uniform3f, GLShader.Uniform4f, GLShader.Uniform4fv, GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv

      static boolean isLikelyToPerform(GLContext ctx)
      Returns false if the GL context doesn't support sufficient numbers of vertex uniform vectors to allow this shader to run with good performance, true otherwise.
